Let's get started! : Please enter
verification code.} {!showOTP ? ) => { setSubmitting(false); setShowOTP(true); }} > {({ errors, touched, submitForm }) => (
{({ field }: FieldProps) => ( +65, }} > Ten Twenty Thirty )} {({ field }: FieldProps) => ( )} ALREADY HAVE AN ACCOUNT? LOG IN
)} : } ) } export default OTP;
